title: OIP-10 Audit for OctoFi DApp and Smart Contracts
body:
This proposal seeks to have the OctoFi Smart Contracts audited by a reputable auditing service provider. The contracts can be found on these Gits: 
ERC20 Token
https://github.com/octofi/octofi-erc20-smart-contract
Interest Program (Which we want to reactivate inside aquafarm 2.0)
https://github.com/octofi/octofi-yield-smart-contract
DApp
https://github.com/octofi/octofi-app-aquafarm

Benefits of contract / DApp audit:
1. More security and trust in OctoFi.
2. Users who are on the fence would be encouraged to join.
3. Establish credibility as a serious development.
4. Prove that community-led projects can be as serious in all aspects as team-led ones.
5. Improvement of our codebase

On a final note, please give special attention to the companies below who have taken on extra risk of being fully transparent with their quotes agreeing to reveal the price and time estimate to the community. For everyone else we have masked the parameters with relative terms.
For the price:  fair | medium | high 
For the timeframe:  short | medium | long 

Funding: Bonding Curve Sale Funds & Project Reserve (or Private funds if no other project funds available) 
Balance: 33827 USDC 
Balance: 247818 OCTO
Source: https://etherscan.io/address/0xd06777d9b02f677214073cc3c5338904cba7894a

Overview:
1.) Bramah Sytems 
Website: https://bramah.systems
Payment: DAI / USDC
Audit: Contracts and DApp
Timeframe: Medium
Price: Fair

2.) Solidfied
Website: https://solidified.io
Payment: USDC
Audit: Contracts and DApp
Timeframe: 14 days each 
Price: 11,000 USDC DApp and 14,400 USDC Contracts

3.) Slowmist
Website: https://www.slowmist.com
Payment: ETH
Audit: Contracts
Timeframe: 3 days
Price: Fair

4.) Peckshield
Website: https://peckshield.com
Payment: USDC
Audit: Contracts
Timeframe: 5 days
Price: 12000 USDC 

5.) CoinFabrik
Website: https://www.coinfabrik.com
Payment: USDC
Audit: Contracts and DApp
Timeframe: 15 days
Price: 8500 USDC

Question: Who do you choose as your preferred Audit Company?

Please vote for your selection, or feel free to discuss in one of our public communities.

Best wishes from Dr Octavius.
author: 0xD06777d9b02F677214073cC3C5338904CBa7894a
